duties_responsibilities.duty: Supporting multiple facets of the business in different locations such as Orlando, California, North Carolina, Hong Kong, Paris.
Development and maintenance of network communications.
Designing and installing internal and external networks.
Testing and evaluating network systems to eliminate problems and make improvements.
Well versed with the advanced engineering and administration of multiprotocol (BGP, EIGRP, OSPF, ISIS) routers, multilayer switches, network security devices, and network management systems.
Leading and directing the work of others.
Managing services concepts within an outsourcing environment.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree and at least 5 years of experience in the field or in a related area. ITIL v3 studies expected.
